channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here are Apple’s top AI announcements from WWDC 2025
item.description: At WWDC 2025, Apple announced several AI features, such as a workout coach, live translation, and more.

item.title: An Exclusive Look at Infinite Machine’s Olto Electric Bike
item.description: The startup wants to cut through the commuter ebike market with a $3,495 sit-down electric scooter that can still ride in city bike lanes.

item.title: Chime almost died in 2016, turned down by 100 VCs — today it IPO’d at $14.5B
item.description: In 2016 when Chime desperately needed cash, over 100 VCs said no. One seed VC took a chance and saved the company, co-founder Ryan King recalls.

item.title: Snapchat adds new features for creators, including an easier way to edit videos
item.description: Snapchat is introducing a suite of new tools and features to make it easier for creators to post and share content on its platform.

item.title: a16z-backed Infinite Machine shows off cheaper, modular electric scooter
item.description: The Olto is the newest entry into the always-churning market for electric two-wheelers, and it will cost $3,495.

item.title: Hotel management platform Canary nabs $80M Series D from YC, Insight Partners
item.description: Canary, the hotel guest management platform, announced Thursday the raise of an $80 million Series D in a round led by Brighton Park Capital. Harman S...

item.title: Unpacking AI Agents
item.description: Need to make a dinner reservation or change your flight? Now AI agents can do that for you. This episode of Uncanny Valley looks into what Sam Altman ...

item.title: Congress Demands Answers on Data Privacy Ahead of 23andMe Sale
item.description: House Democrats sent letters to the potential buyers of the genetic testing company, asking how they plan to protect customer genetic data under a cha...

item.title: Social Media Is Now a DIY Alert System for ICE Raids
item.description: The undocumented migrant community in the United States is using social networks and other digital platforms to send alerts about raids and the presen...

item.title: How to Avoid Scams and Shoddy Wares on Amazon (2025)
item.description: Amazon is a mucky mess of ads, unknown sellers, misleading sales, and specious information. Defend your dollars while shopping on Amazon with these ti...
